I'm assuming that you're looking for a process that engages the community in the visioning.  If so, we just completed a process that we are very pleased with.  Interface Studio in Philadelphia was our consultant for that.  Here is a video that gives an overview of our process. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GQJ2Ms7dbvM&feature=youtu.be  Feel free to contact me at jroth@suwanee.com with any questions.

author: Alexander McElroy
text: The City of Bloomington, IL (pop. 76,610) is in the very beginning stages of developing a visioning process for both a regional (County wide) community visioning and a local (City wide) visioning. We are interested in finding the right facilitator to assist the City in one or potentially both of these initiatives and I would be interested to see if anyone has had any good experiences with a particular firm or have undergone a similar process and learned some key lessons that could be shared.
title: Visioning Process
